component.name: External Monitor Control
Külső Monitor Fényerőszabályzó
component.summary: Control external monitor brightness via DDC/CI and Apple HID protocols
Külső monitorok fényerejének szabályozása a DDC/CI protokollon keresztül

description.p: Control external monitor brightness via DDC/CI and Apple HID protocols. Features include native support for Apple displays (Studio Display, Pro Display XDR) and LG UltraFine displays, automatic brightness synchronization with COSMIC keyboard brightness keys, brightness profiles, and dark mode toggle.
Állítsd be a külső monitorok fényerejét a DDC/CI protokoll segítségével. A rendszer sötét módjára is gyorsan át lehet váltani.
Fork from COSMIC Utils with significant enhancements:

ul.li: Apple HID display support (Studio Display, Pro Display XDR, LG UltraFine)
Enhanced UI with permission management and about page

description.p: Based on cosmic-ext-applet-external-monitor-brightness from COSMIC Utils, originally created by maciekk64, with contributions from wiiznokes, BrunoWallner, therealmate, and others.
